breakdowns.description: Fetches energy generation data from a configurable external endpoint every 1 minute, stores timestamped energy data in the database, retries failed requests up to 3 times, logs errors using standard logging, and validates that only data in Mega watt hour units is accepted.
conditions: Data must be fetched every 1 minute from an external endpoint configurable via environment variable.
Fetched data must be timestamped and stored in the database.
Failed requests must be retried automatically up to 3 attempts.
Errors must be logged using standard logging.
Only accept and store energy data if it is in Mega watt hour units.

breakdowns.description: Allows users to register with basic information (Name, Email, Password) and optionally submit a picture of the energy source and supporting documents (PDF/image). Uploaded files are validated for type (image/*, application/pdf) and size (limit: 5MB) and stored locally under onboardingdoc/{userid}. A link to the home page (dashboard) must be provided during onboarding to allow skipping uploads, and access to the dashboard is allowed even if documents are not uploaded.
conditions: Users can register with basic information (Name, Email, Password).
Users may optionally submit a picture of the energy source during onboarding.
Users may optionally submit supporting documents (PDF/image) during onboarding.
Uploaded files must be validated for type (image/*, application/pdf) and size (limit: 5MB).
All files must be stored locally under onboardingdoc/{userid}.
A link to the home page (dashboard) must be provided during onboarding to allow skipping uploads.
Access to the main dashboard must be allowed even if documents are not uploaded.

breakdowns.description: Displays current energy generated for the user’s energy source on the home page and allows users to view historical energy data in table or chart format.
conditions: Home page must display current energy generated for the user’s energy source.
Users must be able to view historical energy data in table or chart format.
